text: International Association of Fire Fighters (IAFF) is an international organization dedicated to the firefighters. It was established in 1918 in the United States. The IAFF is a part of the AFL-CIO in the United States and the Canadian Labour Congress in Canada. They are based in Washington, DC. == Other websites == *Official website *Updated listing of IAFF Locals Online Category:International organizations Category:1918 establishments in the United States Category:Firefighting Category:Organizations in Washington, D.C.
title: International Association of Fire Fighters
